name: Greek Hoplite
ability: Phalanx: If more than one Greek Soldier is in play, each soldiers defense is raised by 1.

name: Persian Sparabara
ability: Hold the Line: If the enemy attacks, roll a die. If 2 or less, do 1 damage to the enemy

name: Egyptian Soldier
ability: Armorless: If the enemy attacks, you may roll a die.  If 2 or less, you may retreat this unit.

name: Sumerian Infantry
ability: Transport Reinforcements: If this unit dies, roll a die, if 2 or less, leave the card in play as a 'reinforcement'

name: Hittite Warrior
ability: Peace Treaty: If the enemy attacks, roll a die, if 3 or less, the enemy cannot attack this unit next turn.

name: Shang Archer
ability: Crossbow: Roll a die, if 3 or less choose any of the opponent's warriors.  Do 1 damage to that warrior.

name: Phonecian Calvary
ability: Height Advantage: This Phonecian Calvary's defense is raised by 1 during your opponent's next turn.

name: Assyrian Slinger
ability: Sling Stones: If another on of your warriors attacks, roll a die, if 3 or less the attack is raise by 1.

name: Mauritanian Longbowman
ability: Drawn Longbow: This Mauryan Longbowman's attack increases by 1.

name: Hunnic Warrior
ability: Mail Armor: If your opponent attacks during their turn, roll a die, if 3 or less that attack does 1 less damage.

name: Early Roman Infantry
ability: Strategic Attack: If this unit kills an opponent, choose another opponent card and deal 1 damage to it.
